artist: Painter: After Gerard Lairesse; Engraver: George Cooke; Publisher: Vernor and Hood
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate in black: LAIRESSE | on sheet below image in black: Painted by Himself   Engraved by George Cooke / London / Publish'd by Vernor, Hood & Sharpe  Poultry 1807 | in pencil on sheet: 1-671
title: Portrait of Gerard Lairesse
